items.title: Andonis Philippidis
items.testimonial: As a technologically very advanced and at the same time business oriented fast learner and team leader who always tries to be at the edge of technology and development, Muhammet is a person of trust and a person to count on when things need to be done. I enjoy very much working with him...

items.title: Prof. Dr. M. Yaşar Özden
items.testimonial: Muhammet Turşak'ı lisans öğrenimi sırasında benden aldığı derslerden başlayarak tanıma şansım oldu. Çalışkan, bilgili, işten kaçmayan, disiplinli, bilgisini gerçek hayat problemlerinin çözümünde başarıyla kullanabilen çok iyi bir insadır diye özetleyebilirim. Saygılarımla

items.title: Johan Sellström
items.testimonial: Muhammet is one of the best and most efficient developer I worked with. He puts in whatever it takes to achieve your goals and is very self propelled.

items.title: Aslak Felin
items.testimonial: As the former CEO of Infrion, a health tech start-up, I cannot emphasise enough the exceptional work ethic and commitment Muhammet Tursak brought to the role of Lead Programmer. He consistently demonstrated an ability to deliver high-quality results with impressive speed, often exceeding our timelines without compromising on the integrity or creativity of the solutions. Muhammet's proficiency in multiple frameworks, allowed him to seamlessly navigate complex technical challenges and contribute significantly to our product innovation. He was always willing to discuss and take in new perspectives, ensuring that everyone was aligned and motivated to achieve our shared goals. He took initiative, was always open to delve deeper or make things more efficient with creativity and problem-solving skills.

items.title: Çetin Balanuye
items.testimonial: I have known Muhammet Turşak for about 10 years. He served in my instructional software development team as chief developer. He is extremely task oriented, easy-to-communicate and solution-driven type person that facilitates project difficulties of any kind. I have no reservation in recommending Muhammet for high quality IT projects as either manager or assistant manager.

items.title: Prof. Dr. Kürşat Çağıltay
items.testimonial: Muhammet was one of my undergrad students at METU. He was very diligent and hard working person. More importantly he had self-learning ability so he could easily adopt to new technologies. His personality is also unique, teamwork oriented and easygoing person. It was always a pleasure to work with Muhammet.

items.title: Alexander Berler
items.position: Head of Consulting Services | Chair at HL7 Hellas
items.testimonial: I have the honor to work together with Muhammet in conjunction with the proempower pcp project as members of the DM4ALL Consortium. Muhammet is an important cornerstone of our project. He is always proactive with an excel experience in health care information exchange integration. It is surely trustful person and a perfect partner with very high professional standards.

items.title: Umut Hüseyinoğlu
items.testimonial: Muhammet and I worked together on the e-Ders Project at METU Informatics Institute. During this period I was the direct supervisor of Muhammet and had the chance to observe his work closely. He was always punctual, businesslike and very disciplined. I consider myself extremely fortunate for having worked with Muhammet and sincerely believe he would make a tremendous addition to any software development team.

items.title: Fırat Özerden
items.testimonial: During 2015 and 2017 I have had the privilege to work with Muhammet Turşak on a major project in Turkey. I have rarely come across such a focused and competent Software-Architect leading a project. He has been a key for the success of the project, being 2 steps ahead of the customer at all times. I would blindly recommend him to any team-lead in his field of expertise.

items.title: Uwe Weimer
items.testimonial: Muhammet is one of the best Senior Software Architect and Team Leader I ever met. Always in good mood and keen to support his customers, even they have challenging requests. I belief, if somebody can do this kind of job, then Muhammet is the correct person.

items.title: Eleftheria Polychronidou
items.position: Staff Data Scientist | Tech Product Owner
items.testimonial: Software Architecture expert is the phrase that comes to mind when I think about Muhammet. I had the pleasure of working with Muhammet for two years at the ProEmpower EU project, collaborating on several tasks. Muhammet's ability to handle multiple tasks was unlike any I've seen before and made a significant increase in the productivity level of our consortium. No matter how tense a meeting, Muhammet made sure everyone has a clear view of the project needs and the next steps. As a team member or a leader, Muhammet earns my highest recommendation.

items.title: Kostas Karkaletsis
items.position: Chief Technology Officer at Gnomon Informatics SA
items.testimonial: Muhammet is a very efficient, collaborative and experienced Senior Software Architect. It's a pleasure to work with him. He has great skills in management, testing and deployment of web applications. We learnt a lot from his experience in docker and container environments. We worked together integrating the DM4All solution in Turkey, Italy, Portugal and Spain.

items.title: Veli Bicer
items.position: Head Of Engineering at A5 Labs
items.testimonial: Ingenious talent in visual arts and excellent analytical skills. He shows all the skills that a complete engineer should have...

items.title: Davut Gürbüz
items.testimonial: Muhammet is a self motivated person. He is very desired on any phase of software development process. Beside this he is an enthusiastic developer for .NET technologies. He shares his know-how & knowledge generously. I feel myself lucky for working with him. You can't find modest, generous and collaborative developers nowadays. So I certainly recommend him.

items.title: Mesut Demirer
items.company: Infera Teknoloji ve Bilişim Hizmetleri A.Ş.
items.testimonial: I worked with Muhammet two year ago in an software projects for his company. Also, he has a good sense of humor that makes him loved by all of his project group and he treats his employees like his friends so that he can get his work done in time and also make sure that his employees enjoy their time while working with him. I recommend him to every employee who wants to work with a friendly and skilled employer.

items.title: Erol Ozcelik
items.testimonial: Muhammet Turşak has demonstrated excellent programming and analytical skills. He can easily learn latest technical and tools and offer solutions by using his knowledge.

items.title: Gülpembe Ergin
items.testimonial: Birlikte Vaka Karması yazılım projesinde çalıştık. Sen hayal et Muhammet yazsın. Sonunda çıkan ürün senin hayalinin ötesindedir. İletişimi kolay, pozitif, bildiklerini paylaşan, lider, analitik düşünen bir çalışma arkadaşıdır.

items.title: Dr. Mehmet Alp Karabas
items.position: Managing Partner-Turkey at the Hylman Group
items.testimonial: Muhammet is one of the most intelligent, hardworking and disciplined person I have ever met who is empowered with his kind & polite personality. He is a top professional in his field with creative insights, flexible and on-demand solutions with 7/24 service availability. I wish a very bright and successful career in his life.
